experience: You and Benjamin both know Gavin Stevens, Geoffrey Viado, and 12 others
Benjamin can introduce you to 5 people at American Express
Utah mom turns ideas into big business through Amazon
Honored to represent the UPS Latino Community with fellow UPSers at the 2017 Hispanic Association for Corporate Responsibility Leadership Pipeline Program #2017HACRLPP

On the Human-Centered-Design group, supporting experiences across operations, focused on the fulfillment centers (Traditional, Kiva and Prime Now).Previously was on the Webstore team delivering an improved experience to a legacy system that allowed sellers to manage their brand presentation of their website connected to the Amazon selling engine.

Co-led the business analyst effort for a mutli-million dollar contract for an e-commerce solution.Helping to improve the documentation and process used in e-commerce projects.Solution analysis and specification writing for complex telecommunication online sales and self-service portal

Defined and implemented strategies to improve the user experience of the Workforce Management product. Built the user experience department from scratch with internal and external recruits. Managed and directed the efforts of the interaction designers, technical writers and an e-learning team.
Analyze and Design product solutions for Windows, Web, and handheld devices with a focus on usability.

Developed and maintained in house products and services used to support a mortgage document management and delivery system. Main skill set involved Visual Basic 6.0, XML/XSLT, HTML, PHP, SQL Server, and MySQL.

October 3, 2012, Anthony was senior to Benjamin but didn’t manage directly

There are few who are lucky to have mentors that set the path for their careers in such a positive trajectory. Anthony was one who was an inspiration to work with. He demanded my very best, but also coached me along to achieve more. He had a strong understanding of user experience principles and we were able to collaborate making significant improvements to our processes and deliverables. I continue to glean from his insights and perspectives. He likewise shows interest in my feedback and has made me a better designer because of it.

Dmitri Nikolajev
Product Design Team Lead
July 18, 2012, Benjamin managed Dmitri directly

I was able to work alongside Dmitri in our newly created design team. He brought his existing knowledge of the product to good use and was a great mentor to the other designers. He was always humble and willing to learn, but never shied away with sharing the knowledge on topics that he knew. He was instrumental in the corporate and product re-branding projects. He also showed his versatility as he gained greater competence in interaction design to complement his great graphic design skills. He demonstrated his resourcefulness with sharing insights on articles he researched with other team members and instigated discussions around the principles and how we could apply them better as a team. I would gladly recommend him as a team player who will help improve the user experience.

summary: I am a passionate user experience leader, aligning business strategy with new product development.In my 15+ years in software design and development, I have been involved in the entire product lifecycle from inception to delivery.- I have integrated user experience teams into companies and championed changes towards agile methods.- I have been an engineer and architect of complex business software- I have used my MBA education to drive strategic direction and manage a diverse group of designers.I bring business and technology together in a way that delights the customer.
name: Benjamin Farrow
title: Manager User Experience and Design at Amazon
